nodes.text: The Tromper Crags White Maw base was a base built by the White Maw pirates in the cliffs south of the Snow Hills Pass on the planet Hoth. Though it was named for the Tromper Crags, the Crags themselves were located to the west in the Highmount Ridge. Shai Tenna used it as his base of operations.
The Tromper Crags White Maw base appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it is the location of the Smuggler class mission "Brotherhood" on Hoth.
